# instantMessageAddresses

**Instance Property**

An array of labeled IM addresses for the contact.

## Declaration

```swift
var instantMessageAddresses: [CNLabeledValue<CNInstantMessageAddress>] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is an array of [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNLabeledValue] objects, each of which has a label and a [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNInstantMessageAddress] value.

## Getting Related Information

- **contactRelations**: An array of labeled relations for the contact.
